title: Re Compose Liquid Notes v1.5.2.1 - DYNAMiCS [deepstatus]
description:
Re Compose Liquid Notes v1.5.2.1 WiN








Liquid Notes is a revolutionary stand-alone instrument and plugin that combines a world-class composer, songwriting partner, arranger and a set of meticulously designed controls and functions - all in one package! Beyond breathtaking musical skill and analytical capabilities, Liquid Notes allows the user unlimited creativity and inspiration through its groundbreaking functionality.

Drag and drop any MIDI file onto Liquid Notes and have it analyzed providing you with the corresponding chord symbols and a detailed piano-roll view of the notes in any track. Regardless of the arrangements complexity and style, Liquid Notes provides an accurate analysis of your music and establishes a solid base for the changes and alterations you may want to make to selected tracks or an entire arrangement. Drag, drop and lay down the foundation to a new tune in no time!

The software offers a wealth of revolutionary and creative songwriting features. Use any MIDI file and transform the chords and harmonic progression to your liking, use the groundbreaking Liquid Notes drop-down chord selector, change the basic functionality and directionality of any chord and spice up the flavour of your music by adding to your chords varying degrees of tension and harmonic colour with the simple twist of a knob.





Features

Standalone software for assistance in composing, harmonic analysis, and reharmonization: manipulation of chord functions, substitutions (exchanges), tensions (degree of dissonance), and cadences (progressions)
Live improvisation and melody creation: corrects incorrect notes as you are playing them
Import your own compositions for harmonic alteration and "effect optimization"
Selection of style templates (pre-arranged music sequences): MIDI arrangements in various styles for harmonic alteration to get fresh musical ideas and to use further as sequences for larger compositions/productions
Multi-track MIDI routing to software sequencers such as Logic, Cubase, Live, Pro Tools, Sonar, and many more, to control software instruments: no connection via VST, AU, or RTAS necessary
Built-in synthesizers for independent use from sequencers



System requirements


Liquid Notes is implemented entirely in Java, which allows system-independent use in
Windows and Mac OS X. The recommended version of Java is 1.6.0_25+. Windows. Windows XP, Vista, and Windows 7 & 8, 32/64 are supported.

Mac OS X. Due to certain restrictions with the Apple MIDI loopback driver, IAC bus use is recommended only from Java 1.6.0_25. Liquid Notes works with Mac OS X 10.5 or higher.

Note: Since Liquid Notes works on operating system level and is listed to the outside as a MIDI device via virtual busses, it should operate flawlessly with any commercially available sequencers. This compatibility was so far tested with Cubase (Windows versions 5, 6, and 7) and Logic (versions 8 and 9), Live, Sonar X1, and Pro Tools (from version 8 ). Further tests are planned with more sequencers.
See special instructions for MIDI export from Live on page 12.
